description: Try our easy to follow Smoked Salmon Fettuccine recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Seafood pasta,Pescatarian,Prawn,Tree nut free,Valentine's Day,Sesame free,Soy free,Tomato,Asparagus,Peanut free,Salmon
name: Smoked Salmon Fettuccine Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 6 green king prawns, peeled, deveined, halved

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a saucepan of water to the boil. Add pasta and stir. Cook for 5 minutes. Drain pasta, reserving 1/4 cup of the cooking water, and return to pan. Cover with lid and set saucepan aside.

Meanwhile, heat butter in a frying pan over low heat. Add prawns, spring onion, tomato and garlic and cook for 5 minutes. Add cream and juice. Stir for 2 minutes until thick. Add peas, salmon, reserved cooking water and capers. Swirl pan. Remove from heat. Season with salt and pepper. Add pasta to pan and gently fold through.
Divide pasta between serving bowls and garnish with chives. Serve with asparagus.
